veninsword.name: Venin Edge
veninsword.desc: Poisons the target on hit. Turns into an Iron Sword if stolen.

slimsword.name: Slim Sword
slimsword.desc: Lightweight and simple to hit with.

ironblade.name: Iron Blade
ironblade.desc: Deadly sword, but difficult to wield.

kingmaker.name: Kingmaker
kingmaker.desc: Strikes consecutively. High critical rate. Gives <:jugdral_charm:1317280245442941029>Charm.

flamesword.name: Flame Sword
flamesword.desc: Casts <:jugdral_fire:1317240001200652298>Fire magic at range. Gives +5 Mag.

lightningsword.name: Lightning Sword
lightningsword.desc: Casts <:jugdral_thunder:1317240071778467841>Thunder magic at range. Gives +5 Skl.

windsword.name: Wind Sword
windsword.desc: Casts <:jugdral_wind:1317240642895609886>Wind magic at range. Gives +5 Spd.

sleepedge.name: Sleep Edge
sleepedge.desc: Puts the target to Sleep on hit. Targets on thrones or gates are immune.

berserksword.name: Berserk Sword
berserksword.desc: Berserks the target on hit. Targets on thrones or gates are immune.

lightbrand.name: Light Brand
lightbrand.desc: Leif only. Casts <:jugdral_light:1317240024613519480>Light magic at range. Gives +10 Lck. Use to heal all HP.

landssword.name: Lands Sword
landssword.desc: Nanna only. Casts potent <:jugdral_light:1317240024613519480>Light magic at range. Drains target's HP.

shadowsword.name: Shadow Sword
shadowsword.desc: Mareeta only. Strikes consecutively. High critical rate. Gives <:jugdral_nihil:1317280288644272188>Nihil.

mareetassword.name: Mareeta's Sword
mareetassword.desc: Mareeta only. Strikes consecutively. High critical rate. Gives <:jugdral_nihil:1317280288644272188>Nihil.

beoblade.name: Beo Blade
beoblade.desc: Diarmuid/Fergus only. High critcal rate. Gives <:jugdral_vantage:1317280354343845949>Vantage and <:jugdral_wrath:1317280364766691439>Wrath.

blessedsword.name: Blessed Sword
blessedsword.desc: Olwen only. Strikes consecutively. High critical rate. Anti-Cavalry. Gives +10 Mag and <:jugdral_miracle:1317280280125378642>Miracle.

bragisblade.name: Bragi's Blade
bragisblade.desc: Leif/Nanna/Diarmuid/Fergus only. Pierces Loptrian Fang's curse. Anti-Armor. Gives <:jugdral_miracle:1317280280125378642>Miracle.

loptrianfang.name: Loptrian Fang
loptrianfang.desc: Raydrik only. Halves enemy's attack power. Gives +20 Mag.

slimlance.name: Slim Lance
slimlance.desc: Lightweight and simple to hit with.

veninlance.name: Venin Lance
veninlance.desc: Poisons the target on hit. Turns into an Iron Lance if stolen.

gaebolg.name: Gáe Bolg
gaebolg.desc: High critical rate. Strikes consecutively. Gives +10 Str, <:jugdral_nihil:1317280288644272188>Nihil, <:jugdral_wrath:1317280364766691439>Wrath, <:jugdral_vantage:1317280354343845949>Vantage and <:jugdral_charm:1317280245442941029>Charm.

gungnir.name: Gungnir
gungnir.desc: High critical rate. Strikes consecutively. Gives +10 Def, <:jugdral_nihil:1317280288644272188>Nihil, <:jugdral_wrath:1317280364766691439>Wrath, <:jugdral_vantage:1317280354343845949>Vantage and <:jugdral_paragon:1317280296944795668>Paragon.

masterlance.name: Master Lance
masterlance.desc: Can attack at range. Strikes consecutively.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: Finn only. Strikes consecutively. Gives +10 Lck.

veninaxe.name: Venin Axe
veninaxe.desc: Poisons the target on hit. Turns into an Iron Axe if stolen

devilaxe.name: Devil Axe
devilaxe.desc: (21 - Luck)% chance to damage its user instead.

battleaxe.name: Battle Axe
battleaxe.desc: Deadly axe, but difficult to wield.

masteraxe.name: Master Axe
masteraxe.desc: Can attack at range. Strikes consecutively.

vouge.name: Vouge
vouge.desc: Osian only. Can attack at range. High critical rate.

veninbow.name: Venin Bow
veninbow.desc: Anti-Fliers. Poisons the target on hit. Turns into an Iron Bow if stolen.

bravebow.name: Brave Bow
bravebow.desc: Strikes consecutively. High critical rate. Anti-Fliers.

veninballista.name: Venin Ballista
veninballista.desc: Long Range. Anti-Fliers. Poisons the target on hit. Turns into a Ballista if stolen

brokenbow.name: Broken Bow
brokenbow.desc: A broken bow. Almost unusable. Anti-Fliers.

valflame.name: Valflame
valflame.desc: Exalted fire magic. High critical rate.

thoron.name: Thoron
thoron.desc: Superior thunder magic. High critical rate.

bolting.name: Bolting
bolting.desc: Long range thunder magic. High critical rate.

mjolnir.name: Mjölnir
mjolnir.desc: Exalted thunder magic. High critical rate.

reference.Mistranslation:
Due to a mistranslation, the in-game description states that the tome increases Skl by 20 and Spd by 10.
It does not increase any stats.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Loing range wind magic. Applies Sleep on hit. Targets on thrones or gates are immune.

grafcalibur.name: Grafcalibur
grafcalibur.desc: Asbel only. High critical rate. Anti-Fliers.

forseti.name: Forseti
forseti.desc: Ced only. Gives +20 Skl & Spd, High critical rate. Exalted wind magic. Anti-Fliers.

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.desc: Basic light magic. High critical rate.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Potent light magic. Drains target's HP.

jormungand.name: Jörmungand
jormungand.desc: Potent dark magic. Poisons the target on hit if used by enemy mages.

poison.name: Poison
poison.desc: Poisons the target on hit. Turns into a Fenrir if stolen

petrify.name: Petrify
petrify.desc: Long range dark magic. Petrifies on hit. Turns into a Fenrir if stolen.

hel.name: Hel
hel.desc: Loptrians only. Reduces target's HP to 1. Cannot kill.

drainedtome.name: Drained Tome
drainedtome.desc: A tome drained of its magic. Unusable.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restore 10 HP + user's Mag to an ally.

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Restore 20 HP + user's Mag to an ally.

torchstaff.name: Torch Staff
torchstaff.desc: Gives +10 vision in fog of war. Effect decreases by 1 every turn.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: Gives +10 vision in fog of war. Effect decreases by 1 every turn.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Restore all HP to an ally.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: Restore 10 HP + user's Mag to an ally.

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc: Restores any status (except Stone) from an ally.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.desc: Puts a target with lower Mag to Sleep. Enemies on thrones or gates are immune.

reference.Other Effects:
Infliction rate: Hit + (Skill × 4)
Never miss if user's Skill ≥ 10.

ensorcel.name: Ensorcel
ensorcel.desc: Gives +7 Mag to an ally. Effect decreases by 1 every turn.

watch.name: Watch
watch.desc: Reveals concealed areas under a roof.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restore 10 HP + user's Mag to all allies.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Transports an ally to a traversable tile next to the user.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Silences a target with lower Mag. Enemies on thrones or gates are immune.

reference.Other Effects:
Infliction rate: Hit + (Skill × 4)
Never miss if user's Skill ≥ 10.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Transports an ally to any traversable tile on the map.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: Berserks a target with lower Mag. Enemies on thrones or gates are immune.

reference.Other Effects:
Infliction rate: 60 + (Skill × 4)
Never miss if user's Skill ≥ 10.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Allows an ally to escape the chapter.

rewarp.name: Rewarp
rewarp.desc: Transports the user to any traversable tile on the map.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Safy only. Restores an ally's staff or weapon to pristine condition.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: Tina only. Steals a weapon, staff or item from a target with lower Mag.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc: Tina only. Opens a door or chest, or lower a drawbridge.

kia.name: Kia
kia.desc: Sara only. Removes the Stone status from an ally.

brokenstaff.name: Broken Staff
brokenstaff.desc: A staff drained of its magic. Unusable.

vulnerary.name: Vulnerary
vulnerary.desc: Restore all HP to the user.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Gives +7 Mag to the user. Effect decreases by 1 every turn.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.desc: Opens doors and chests, or lowers drawbridges. Units with <:jugdral_steal:1317280345183354901>Steal only.

sdrink.name: S Drink
sdrink.desc: Removes Fatigue or allows a fatigued unit to be deployed.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Promotes most base class units that are at least Level 10 to an advanced class.

membercard.name: Member Card
membercard.desc: If someone with this card stops in a suspicious space...

luckring.name: Luck Ring
luckring.desc: Increases Luck by 3. Vanishes after use.

lifering.name: Life Ring
lifering.desc: Increases HP by 7. Vanishes after use.

speedring.name: Speed Ring
speedring.desc: Increases Speed by 3. Vanishes after use.

magicring.name: Magic Ring
magicring.desc: Increases Magic by 2. Vanishes after use.

strengthring.name: Strength Ring
strengthring.desc: Increases Strength by 3. Vanishes after use.

bodyring.name: Body Ring
bodyring.desc: Increases Constitution by 3. Vanishes after use.

shieldring.name: Shield Ring
shieldring.desc: Increases Defense by 2. Vanishes after use.

skillring.name: Skill Ring
skillring.desc: Increases Skill by 3. Vanishes after use.

legring.name: Leg Ring
legring.desc: Increases Movement by 2. Vanishes after use.

odscroll.name: Od's Scroll
odscroll.desc:
<:scroll_od:1317240279052456056> Grants +30% Skl Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Sword Saint Od. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

baldrscroll.name: Baldr's Scroll
baldrscroll.desc:
<:scroll_baldr:1317240170348806205> Grants +5% HP Growth, +5% Str Growth, +5% Skl Growth, +5% Spd Growth, +5% Lck Growth, +5% Def Growth.
A scrap of the writings of the Holy Knight Baldr. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

hodrscroll.name: Hoðr's Scroll
hodrscroll.desc:
<:scroll_hodr:1317240245351354479> Grants +30% HP Growth, +10% Str Growth. Inflicts -10% Lck Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Black Knight Hoðr. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

dainnscroll.name: Dáinn's Scroll
dainnscroll.desc:
<:scroll_dainn:1317240215202566254> Grants +5% Str Growth, +30% Def Growth, +5% Mov Growth. Inflicts -10% Spd Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Dragon Knight Dáinn. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

njorunscroll.name: Njörun's Scroll
njorunscroll.desc:
<:scroll_njorun:1317240269690900480> Grants +30% Str Growth, +10% Spd Growth, +5% Def Growth. Inflicts -10% Mag Growth, -5% Lck Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Lance Knight Njörun. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

nalscroll.name: Nál's Scroll
nalscroll.desc:
<:scroll_nal:1317240256864456774> Grants +10% HP Growth, +10% Str Growth, +10% Def Growth, +10% Con Growth. Inflicts -10% Skl Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Axe Fighter Nál. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

ullrscroll.name: Ullr's Scroll
ullrscroll.desc:
<:scroll_ullr:1317240301835915375> Grants +10% Skl Growth, +10% Spd Growth, +10% Lck Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Bow User Ullr. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

thrudscroll.name: Thrud's Scroll
thrudscroll.desc:
<:scroll_thrud:1317240291899609088> Grants +5% HP Growth, +5% Str Growth, +5% Mag Growth, +10% Skl Growth, +5% Lck Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Mage Knight Thrud. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

fjalarscroll.name: Fjalar's Scroll
fjalarscroll.desc:
<:scroll_fjalar:1317240225419890730> Grants +5% Str Growth, +5% Mag Growth, +10% Skl Growth, +10% Spd Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Mage Fighter Fjalar. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

cedscroll.name: Ced's Scroll
cedscroll.desc:
<:scroll_ced:1317240198198984815> Grants +10% Mag Growth, +30% Spd Growth. Inflicts -10% HP Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Wind User Ced. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

bragiscroll.name: Bragi's Scroll
bragiscroll.desc:
<:scroll_bragi:1317240180674924635> Grants +10% Mag Growth, +30% Lck Growth. Inflicts -10% Str Growth.
A scrap of the writings of High Priest Bragi. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.

heimscroll.name: Heim's Scroll
heimscroll.desc:
<:scroll_heim:1317240235201134653> Grants +30% Mag Growth, +10% Lck Growth. Inflicts -10% Def Growth.
A scrap of the writings of Saint Heim. It bestows a mysterious power upon its bearer.
